content: make winter fun with this trendy crochet hat featuring thick caron chunky cupcake yarn worked flat from side to side shorter stitches are stitched along one side edge to create simple shaping while the main body is created using half_double_crochet stitches worked into the horizontal loops for textural ribbing and a fold-over brim the stripes in the yarn create a scrappy effect showcasing the explosion of color in each ball the included pom pom is the cherry on top making this a quick and easy 1-ball project materials caron® chunky cupcake™ 3 5 oz/100 g 126 yds/138 m prismatic 23015 1 ball or 126 yds/138 m size one size to fit adult approx 21 -22 53 5-56 cm head circumference
